Articles.Content:
I threw these together really quickly, much faster than my other tanks, not as perfect accurate hulls but they do look pretty good. Both have detachable, rotating turrets (albeit slightly poor quality rings).

Downloads:

KV-1: https://www./?iljhtcjkt5wjxl3

KV-2: https://www./?n2b8bmb4n237885
I've seen the KV-2's turret referred to as the Glory To Stalin Derp Turret. It seems quite fitting, doesn't it?

I've seen the KV-2's turret referred to as the Glory To Stalin Derp Turret. It seems quite fitting, doesn't it?

The KV-2. Because nothing is more awesome than shooting shells with mini-nuke sized power with half-shotgun accuracy.

I don't get it. I'll try to increase the rating.

Edit: added 5 stars, didn't help.

Same with my IFV on Reddit. Maybe something bad happening in the news involving tanks and we've missed it?

That's it, I'm not continuing with these kind of vehicles.

Edited July 22, 2015 by Azimech

I don't get it. I'll try to increase the rating.

Edit: added 5 stars, didn't help.

Same with my IFV on Reddit. Maybe something bad happening in the news involving tanks and we've missed it?

That's it, I'm not continuing with these kind of vehicles.

It's probably a troll :/ that happens a lot on here. Don't get discouraged by it.
I wonder if people can even see the amount of hours we put in our designs or replica's. Yeah there's a lot of trolling on Reddit too.

Really, one star?

Yup, a one star rating on a clearly lovely build = someone is very jealous. I would take one star ratings as a complement.

5 Stars ofc !

haha , but the jealous could be me ! because i'm far from this aesthetic

Btw , i rate the thread not my mind state !!

Gj again Zekes

It's probably a troll :/ that happens a lot on here. Don't get discouraged by it.

I don't think this has happened to me. Don't worry, I don't even look at the thread rating, especially when I see the magic word "zekes" below the title.
